title: Byteman 4.0.23 has been released
content: Byteman 4.0.23 is now available from the and from the . It is the latest update release for use on all JDK9+ runtimes up to and including JDK23.    Byteman 4.0.23 is primarily a maintenance release which enables Byteman to be used with JDK23 releases. It also contains  two bug fixes and a feature enhancement. More details are provided in the and the latest .
